title: Unlock Your Gaming Potential: All-In-One Guide for Cheats, Tips, and Hidden Features
original_prompt:
Provide a comprehensive list of cheat codes, guides, hidden features, special items, and walkthroughs for any PC or console game, along with links to relevant resources. Simply input the title of the game and the platform it is played on to receive detailed information and tips
Game Title: Grand Theft Auto V
Format: PC
input1: Game Title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, Format: Nintendo Switch
input2: Game Title: Dark Souls III, Format: PlayStation 4
input1_ans:
Here’s a comprehensive list of cheat codes, guides, hidden features, special items, and walkthroughs for **The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild** on the **Nintendo Switch**:

### Cheat Codes
While Breath of the Wild does not have traditional cheat codes, players can use various glitches and exploits to gain advantages. Here are a few notable ones:

1. **Infinite Stamina Glitch**: 
   - Perform a shield surf while holding a stamina-replenishing item. If done correctly, you can surf indefinitely.
   
2. **Item Duplication**:
   - Drop an item, then pick it up while quickly saving and loading your game. This can duplicate certain items.

### Hidden Features
1. **Secret Shrines**: 
   - There are numerous hidden shrines throughout Hyrule. Use the Sheikah Sensor to help locate them.
   
2. **Korok Seeds**: 
   - Collecting Korok seeds can be done by solving small puzzles scattered across the map. There are 900 in total.

3. **Master Mode**: 
   - Unlocks a harder difficulty mode with tougher enemies and regenerating health.

### Special Items
1. **Master Sword**: 
   - Located in the Korok Forest, it requires 13 heart containers to pull from its pedestal.
   
2. **Champion Weapons**: 
   - Each Champion has a unique weapon that can be obtained through their respective quests.

3. **Armor Sets**: 
   - Collect various armor sets that provide bonuses, such as the Barbarian Set for increased attack power or the Stealth Set for sneaking.

### Walkthroughs
1. **Main Quest Walkthrough**: 
   - A detailed guide covering all main quests, including tips for defeating bosses.
   - [IGN Breath of the Wild Walkthrough](https://www.ign.com/wikis/the-legend-of-zelda-breath-of-the-wild)

2. **Shrine Locations**: 
   - A comprehensive list of all shrine locations and their puzzles.
   - [Polygon Shrine Locations Guide](https://www.polygon.com/zelda-breath-of-the-wild-guide/2017/3/3/14764680/shrine-locations)

3. **Korok Seed Locations**: 
   - A guide to finding all 900 Korok seeds.
   - [GameSpot Korok Seed Locations](https://www.gamespot.com/articles/breath-of-the-wild-korok-seed-locations-guide/1100-6447065/)

### Additional Resources
- **Interactive Map**: 
   - An interactive map showing all collectibles, shrines, and more.
   - [Zelda Maps](https://www.zeldadungeon.net/interactive-map/breath-of-the-wild-map/)

- **YouTube Guides**: 
   - Video walkthroughs for visual learners.
   - [ZeldaMaster YouTube Channel](https://www.youtube.com/user/ZeldaMaster)

- **Community Forums**: 
   - Engage with other players for tips and tricks.
   - [Zelda Universe Forums](https://zeldauniverse.net/forums/)

### Tips
- **Save Often**: 
   - Use multiple save slots to avoid losing progress.
- **Experiment with Cooking**: 
   - Combine different ingredients to create meals that provide various buffs.
- **Explore Thoroughly**: 
   - Take your time to explore the vast world of Hyrule; many secrets are hidden off the beaten path.

This should provide a solid foundation for your adventure in **The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild** on the Nintendo Switch! Enjoy your journey through Hyrule!
input2_ans:
Here’s a comprehensive list of cheat codes, guides, hidden features, special items, and walkthroughs for **Dark Souls III** on PlayStation 4:

### Cheat Codes
**Note:** Dark Souls III does not have traditional cheat codes like some other games. However, players can use exploits or glitches, but these can lead to bans in online play.

### Guides
1. **Beginner's Guide**: A comprehensive guide for new players covering the basics of combat, leveling, and exploration.
   - [Beginner's Guide to Dark Souls III](https://www.ign.com/wikis/dark-souls-3/Beginner%27s_Guide)

2. **Weapon and Armor Guide**: Detailed information on the best weapons and armor sets, including their locations and stats.
   - [Weapon and Armor Guide](https://www.gamepur.com/guide/dark-souls-3-best-weapons-armor)

3. **Magic and Spells Guide**: Overview of the magic system, including sorceries, miracles, and pyromancies.
   - [Magic and Spells Guide](https://www.fextralife.com/dark-souls-3-magic-guide/)

### Hidden Features
1. **Hidden Areas**: There are several hidden areas in Dark Souls III that can be accessed through exploration and specific actions.
   - [Hidden Areas Guide](https://www.polygon.com/dark-souls-3-guide/2016/3/24/11297080/hidden-areas)

2. **Secret Bosses**: Some bosses can be missed if certain conditions are not met.
   - [Secret Bosses Guide](https://www.ign.com/wikis/dark-souls-3/Secret_Bosses)

### Special Items
1. **Estus Shards**: Collect these to increase your healing capacity.
   - [Estus Shard Locations](https://www.ign.com/wikis/dark-souls-3/Estus_Shard)

2. **Titanite Shards**: Used for upgrading weapons and armor.
   - [Titanite Shard Locations](https://www.fextralife.com/dark-souls-3-titanite-shard-locations/)

3. **Unique Weapons**: Some weapons have unique abilities or scaling.
   - [Unique Weapons Guide](https://www.gamepur.com/guide/dark-souls-3-unique-weapons)

### Walkthroughs
1. **Full Game Walkthrough**: A step-by-step guide through the entire game, including boss strategies and item locations.
   - [Dark Souls III Full Walkthrough](https://www.gamefaqs.gamespot.com/ps4/168566-dark-souls-iii/faqs/73882)

2. **Boss Fight Strategies**: Detailed strategies for defeating each boss in the game.
   - [Boss Fight Strategies](https://www.fextralife.com/dark-souls-3-boss-guide/)

3. **Area Walkthroughs**: Individual walkthroughs for each area, including enemy locations and secrets.
   - [Area Walkthroughs](https://www.ign.com/wikis/dark-souls-3/Walkthrough)

### Additional Resources
- **Fextralife Wiki**: A comprehensive resource for all things Dark Souls III, including builds, lore, and community discussions.
  - [Fextralife Dark Souls III Wiki](https://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Dark+Souls+III+Wiki)

- **YouTube Walkthroughs**: Video guides can be very helpful for visual learners.
  - [YouTube Dark Souls III Walkthrough](https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=dark+souls+iii+walkthrough)

- **Reddit Community**: Join the Dark Souls III subreddit for tips, discussions, and community help.
  - [r/DarkSouls3](https://www.reddit.com/r/darksouls3/)

### Conclusion
Dark Souls III is a challenging game that rewards exploration and skill. Utilize the guides and resources above to enhance your gameplay experience. Remember to take your time, learn from your mistakes, and enjoy the rich world of Lothric!
